import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homework043', templateUrl: './homework043.component.html', styleUrls: ['./homework043.component.css'], }) export class Homework043Component { showPassword = false; secretPassword = 'tuna'; clickNumber = [0]; clickMax: Array = []; displayDetails() { this.showPassword ? (this.showPassword = false) : (this.showPassword = true); this.clickNumber++; /* this.clickMax.forEach((element) => { console.log(element); }); */ console.log(this.clickMax); } }
